sentences: Ta Ãµpib uut ala praktiliselt tundma.
context: The Estonian word 'praktiliselt' is an adverb with multiple meanings. It can mean 'in practice' or practically when describing how something is done in reality versus theory; it can mean 'practically' or 'usefully' when describing something that serves a practical purpose; and it can mean 'actually', 'really', or 'almost' when indicating the true state of affairs or approaching a condition.
